tika-s0202t0:271_5: Vipassanāvasena gacchatoti “samathavasena gacchato”ti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0202t0:271_6: Ayañca puggalavibhāgo suttantanayena idhābhihito pariyāyo nāma,
tika-s0202t0:271_8: Ayaṃ sabhāvadhammoyevāti pubbabhāgapaṭipadā samathappadhānā ce samādhi dhuraṃ,
tika-s0202t0:271_9: vipassanāpadhānā ce paññā dhuranti ayaṃ dhammasabhāvoyeva,
tika-s0202t0:272_3: aniccādivasena vipassanābhiniveso viya samathavasena vipassanāvasena ca yaṃ pubbabhāgagamanaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:272_5: yassa samādhi dhuraṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ balavaṃ hoti,
tika-s0202t0:272_7: Yassa paññā dhuraṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ balavaṃ hoti so ariyo paññāvimutto nāma hoti.
tika-s0202t0:272_8: Idāni tamatthaṃ buddhivisiṭṭhena nidassanena dassento “dve aggasāvakā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0202t0:275_6: So pana kālo sabbabuddhānaṃ sabbapaccekabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇavasena pubbaṇho eva idhādhippetoti āha “ekasmiṃ purebhatte asanabhojana”nti.
tika-s0202t0:275_8: yo attano sarīrapakatiṃ ajānanto ekāsanabhojanaṃ bhuñji,
tika-s0202t0:275_9: yena me idaṃ sarīraṃ kisaṃ jātaṃ brahmacariyānuggaho nāhosī”ti evaṃ vippaṭisārakukkuccaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-s0202t0:275_12: Itarathāti yadi ekaṃyeva bhattaṃ dvidhā katvā tato ekassa bhāgassa bhuñjanaṃ ekadesabhuñjanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:275_13: Ko sakkotīti ko evaṃ yāpetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0202t0:275_14: Atītajātiparicayopi nāma imesaṃ sattānaṃyeva anubandhatīti āha “atīte”tiādi.
tika-s0202t0:275_16: Taṃ madditvāti “ayaṃ sikkhā sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane āciṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:275_17: ayañca bhikkhu imaṃ sikkhatevā”ti vatvā taṃ bhaddāliṃ tassa vā anussāhapavedanaṃ abhibhavitvā.
tika-s0202t0:275_19: vihāracārikaṃ caranto tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhagavā gacchati.
tika-s0202t0:276_6: Aparādho hi na khamāpentaṃ yathāpaccayaṃ vitthārito hutvā duppatikāro hoti.
tika-s0202t0:277_0: Alaggitvāti imampi nāma apanītaṃ akāsīti evaṃ avinetvā,
tika-s0202t0:277_1: taṃ taṃ tassa hitapaṭipattiṃ nivāraṇaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0202t0:277_2: Ñāyapaṭipattiṃ aticca eti pavattatīti accayo, aparādho,
tika-s0202t0:277_3: purisena madditvā pavattito aparādho atthato purisaṃ aticca abhibhavitvā pavatto nāma hoti.
tika-s0202t0:277_6: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0202t0:277_8: Yaṃ panettha bhaddālittherassa aparipūrakāritāya bhikkhuādīnaṃ jānanaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:278_2: Evaṃ āṇāpetuṃ na yuttanti saṅkamatthāya āṇāpetuṃ na yuttaṃ payojanābhāvato.
tika-s0202t0:280_0: Mā naṃ kalalaṃ akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti. ;
tika-s0202t0:284_0: Bhagavatā āṇatte sati tesampi evaṃ kātuṃ na yuttanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0202t0:284_1: Etesaṃ paṭibāhituṃ yuttanti idaṃ aṭṭhānaparikappanavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:284_2: Na hi buddhānaṃ kātuṃ āraddhaṃ nāma kiccaṃ kehici paṭibāhituṃ yuttaṃ nāma atthi paṭibāhituṃyeva akaraṇato.
tika-s0202t0:285_0: 137. Na kammaṭṭhānaṃ allīyatīti cittaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ na otarati.
tika-s0202t0:286_2: Sammāvattamhi na vattatīti tassā tassā āpattiyā vuṭṭhānatthaṃ bhagavatā paññattasammāvattamhi na vattati.
tika-s0202t0:286_3: Anulomavatte na vattatīti yena yena vattena saṅgho anulomiko hoti,
tika-s0202t0:286_4: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ anulomavatte na vattati vilomameva gaṇhāti,
tika-s0202t0:286_6: Nitthāraṇakavattamhīti yena vattena saṅgho anulomiko hoti,
tika-s0202t0:287_3: Abhiññāpattāti “asuko asuko ca thero sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo bahussuto”tiādinā abhiññātabhāvaṃ pattā adhigataabhiññātā.
tika-s0202t0:288_1: Sattesu hāyamānesūti kilesabahulatāya paṭipajjanakasattesu parihāyantesu paṭipathesu jāyamānesu.
tika-s0202t0:288_5: Āsavanti tena tena paccayena pavattantīti āsavā.
tika-s0202t0:289_4: tena āvāsamacchariyādihetunā sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhāniyā dhammā na uppajjanti.
tika-s0202t0:289_5: Iminā nayenāti iminā pana hetunā padasodhammasikkhāpadānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:290_1: Sāgatattherassa nāgadamanakittiyasādivasena surāpānasaṅkhāto āsavaṭṭhāniyo dhammo uppajji.
tika-s0202t0:291_0: Rasena rasaṃ saṃsandetvāti upādinnakaphassarasena anupādinnakaphassarasaṃ saṃsandetvā.
tika-s0202t0:292_2: atha kho aññampi atthīti dassento bhagavā “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t0:294_4: Evaṃ karaṇatthanti yathā asse nisinnasseva bhūmiṃ gahetuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0202t0:294_5: evaṃ cattāro pāde tathā katvā attano niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:294_10: Ekasmiṃ ṭhāneti catūsu pādesu yattha katthaci ekasmiṃ ṭhāne gamanaṃ codentīti attho,
tika-s0202t0:295_0: Raññā jānitabbaguṇeti yathā rājā assassa guṇe jānāti,
tika-s0202t0:295_2: Assarājavaṃseti dussahaṃ dukkhaṃ patvāpi yathā ayaṃ rājavaṃsānurūpakiriyaṃ na jahissati,
tika-s0202t0:295_4: Sikkhāpanameva hi sandhāya sabbattha “kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vuttaṃ tassa karaṇakārāpanapariyāyattā.
tika-s0202t0:296_0: Yathā uttamajavo hotīti javadassanaṭṭhāne yathā hayo uttamajavaṃ na hāpesi,
tika-s0202t0:296_3: yathā uttamahayo hotīti kammakaraṇakāle attano uttamasabhāvaṃ aniguhitvā avajjetvā yathā atthasiddhi hoti,
tika-s0202t0:296_5: Yathā kiriyā vinā dabbampi vinā kiriyaṃ na bhavati,
tika-s0202t0:297_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ pakatiyā uttamahayasseva uttamahayakāraṇārahattā uttamajavapaṭipajjane.
tika-s0202t0:297_1: Māsakhādakaghoṭakānanti māsaṃ khāditvā yathā tathā viguṇakhaluṅgakānaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:298_0: Uttame sākhalyeti paramasakhilabhāve sakhilavācāya eva dametabbatāya. Tenāha “muduvācāya hī”tiādi.
tika-s0202t0:299_1: Sammāñāṇaṃ pubbe vuttasammādiṭṭhiyevāti pana idaṃ phalasammādiṭṭhibhāvasāmaññena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:299_5: Evampi nippariyāya sekkhaggahaṇe pariyāyasekkhaggahaṇaṃ na yuttameva,
tika-s0202t0:299_7: Ekā eva hi sā paññā nibbānassa paccakkhakiriyāya sammādassanakiccaṃ upādāya “sammādiṭṭhī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0202t0:299_11: Maggaphalāvahāya desanāya saṅkhepatova āgatattā vuttaṃ “ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa vasenā”ti.
tika-s0202t0:302_1: Mahāudāyittheroti kāḷudāyilāḷudāyittherehi añño mahādehatāya mahāudāyīti sāsane paññāto thero.
tika-s0202t0:303_2: tena ca anantaraniddiṭṭhasamayo paccāmaṭṭhoti āha “yasmiṃ samaye”ti.
tika-s0202t0:303_3: Na bhagavantaṃ paṭiccāti na bhagavantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0202t0:306_0: Attā eva putta nāmāsi, sa jīva saradosata”nti. –
tika-s0202t0:307_0: Ādīsu putto “attā”ti vuccati kulavasena santāne pavattanato.
tika-s0202t0:307_2: Yasmā “bhikkhussa attā mātā”ti vatthukāmā bhayavasena “ātu mātū”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:308_2: Tathā hi naṃ vācakasaddeneva dassento “idhekacce moghapurisā”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:308_3: Āhaṃsūti tesaṃ tathā vacanassa avicchedena pavattidīpananti āha “vadantī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:308_4: Kiṃ panimassa appamattakassāti pahātabbavatthuṃ avamaññamānehi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:308_6: Hetumhi jotetabbe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ yathā “anussavassa hetu,
tika-s0202t0:308_9: Nanu apassantena viya asuṇantena viya bhavitabbanti?
tika-s0202t0:308_10: Satthārā nāma appamattakesu dosesu apassantena viya ca asuṇantena viya ca bhavitabbanti tesaṃ adhippāyena vivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:308_14: Gale baddhaṃ mahākaṭṭhanti gale olambetvā baddhaṃ rukkhadaṇḍamāha.
tika-s0202t0:308_16: Pārājikavatthu viya duppajahaṃ hotīti chandakappahānavasena taṃ pajahituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0202t0:309_2: Apaccāsīsanapakkheti tāya paradattavuttitāya kassaci paccayassa kutoci apaccāsīsakapakkhe ṭhitā hutvā suppajahaṃ hoti,
tika-s0202t0:310_6: Kākātidāyinti ito cito kākehi atipātavasena uḍḍetabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:310_12: tathā sati sā visamarūpā hotīti āha “oṇatā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t0:310_13: So puggalo lūkhabhojī hotīti āha “dhaññaṃ nāma kudrūsako”ti.
tika-s0202t0:310_18: So vatāhaṃ pabbajeyyanti sohaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā pabbajeyyaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:310_19: yohaṃ puriso nāma assaṃ vatāti pabbajjāvasena attano purisaṃ bodheyya.
tika-s0202t0:310_20: Taṃsabhāve ṭhitassa bodhā na tu dukkarā,
tika-s0202t0:312_4: Te tañceva pajahantīti pajahanakā paṭhamaṃ gahitā.
tika-s0202t0:312_5: Rāsivasenāti “idhudāyi ekacco puggalo”tiādinā catukke āgatavibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā “te te”ti pacuravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:312_7: Avibhāgena gahitavatthūsu vibhāgato gahaṇaṃ lokasiddhametanti dassetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:312_8: Pajahanakapuggalāti “te tañceva pajahantī”ti evaṃ pajahanakapuggalā eva.
tika-s0202t0:313_0: Upadhianudhāvanakāti upadhīsu anuanudhāvanakā upadhiyo ārabbha pavattanakā.
tika-s0202t0:313_3: Tassa hi vaseneva te cattāro puggalā jātā.
tika-s0202t0:313_4: Aggamaggatthāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā yāva na taṃ maggena samugghātenti,
tika-s0202t0:313_6: Iti heṭṭhimā tayopi ariyā appahīnassa kilesassa vasena “nappajahantī”ti vuttā,
tika-s0202t0:313_8: Vuttanayena pana vipassanaṃ maggena ghaṭentā te cattāro janā aggamaggakkhaṇe pajahanti nāma.
tika-s0202t0:313_9: Te eva tattha sīghakārino khippaṃ pajahanti nāma,
tika-s0202t0:314_3: Tattha hi “tassa dhātārammaṇameva cittaṃ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccatī”ti ettha atitikkhanātitikkha-
tika-s0202t0:316_1: Ye pajahantīti “te tañceva pajahantī”ti evaṃ vuttapuggalā.
tika-s0202t0:316_2: Te ime nāma ettake kilese pajahantīti ye te puthujjanā lābhino ca pañca kāmaguṇe ettake taṃtaṃjhānādivatthuke
tika-s0202t0:316_3: ca taṃtaṃmaggavajjhatāya paricchinnattā ettake kilese pajahanti.
tika-s0202t0:316_4: Ye nappajahantīti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0202t0:316_9: Gaṇatopi kilesatopi vivittasukhanti gaṇasaṅgaṇikato ca kilesasaṅgaṇikato ca vivittasukhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:317_3: tassa tassa jhānassa khobhakaraṃ oḷārikaṃ jhānaṅgaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:318_4: tasmā analaṃ anusaṅgaṃ kātuṃ ayuttanti attho.
tika-s0202t0:318_6: Sanniṭṭhānanti sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ alaṃ ettāvatāti ussāhapaṭippassambhanavasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ na kātabbanti yojanā.
tika-s0202t0:318_7: Uddhambhāgiyasaññitaṃ aṇuṃ vā orambhāgiyasaññitaṃ thūlaṃ vā,
tika-s0202t0:318_8: rūparāgoti evarūpaṃ aṇuṃ vā kāmāsavo paṭighanti evarūpaṃ thūlaṃ vā,
tika-s0202t0:318_12: Nātitikkhapaññassa vasena desanāya pavattattā “neyyapuggalassa vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:318_13: Sabbaso hi pariyādinnanikantikassa ariyapuggalassa vasena saññāvedayitanirodhassa āgatattā “arahattanikūṭeneva niṭṭhāpitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:322_1: Vacīghosopi hi bahūhi ekaccaṃ pavattito ṭhānato ca dūrataro kevalaṃ mahānigghoso eva hutvā sotapathamāgacchati.
tika-s0202t0:324_6: Kāraṇūpacārena sassesu bījapariyāyoti āha “bījānaṃ taruṇānanti taruṇasassāna”nti.
tika-s0202t0:324_7: Taruṇabhāveneva tassa bhāvino phalassa abhāvena vipariṇāmo.
tika-s0202t0:325_4: Mayampi bhagavā viya diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāreneva viharissāmāti dīpeti pakatiyā vivekajjhāsayabhāvato viraddho āgatassa bhārassa avahanatoyeva.
tika-s0202t0:326_4: tasmā tesaṃ ovādadānatthaṃ bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti.
tika-s0202t0:327_2: sveva cittassa kāyassa ca atippamaddanamathanuppādanehi daḷhaṃ āyāsaṭṭhena upāyāso.
tika-s0202t0:327_3: Anekavāraṃ pavattitvā attanā samavetaṃ sattaṃ ajjhottharitvā sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā anayabyasanapāpanena kodhupāyāsassa ūmisadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0202t0:328_1: Odarikattena khāditoti odarikabhāvena āmisagedhena micchājīvena jīvikākappanena nāsitasīlādiguṇatāya khāditadhammasarīro.
tika-s0202t0:329_1: Pañcakāmaguṇāvaṭṭe nimujjitvāti ettha kāmarāgābhibhūte satte ito ca etto,
tika-s0202t0:329_2: etto ca itoti evaṃ manāpiyarūpādivisayasaṅkhāte āvaṭṭe attānaṃ saṃsāretvā yathā tato bahibhūte nekkhamme cittampi na uppādeti,
tika-s0202t0:329_3: evaṃ āvaṭṭetvā byasanāpādanena kāmaguṇānaṃ āvaṭṭasadisatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0202t0:330_3: Mātugāmaṃ āgammāti mātugāmo hi yonisomanasikārarahitaṃ adhīrapurisaṃ itthikuttabhūtehi attano hāvabhāvavilāsehi
tika-s0202t0:330_4: abhibhuyya gahetvā dhīrajātiyampi attano rūpādīhi palobhanavasena anavasesaṃ attano upakāradhamme sīlādike
tika-s0202t0:330_5: sampādetuṃ asamatthaṃ karonto anayabyasanaṃ pāpeti. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:331_3: taṃ otaritvā bhayaṃ vinodetvā tattha kiccaṃ sādhetabbaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:331_4: itarathā catthasiddhi na hotīti imamatthaṃ upamopamitabbasarūpavasena dassetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:331_5: Tattha udakaṃ nissāya ānisaṃso pipāsavinayanaṃ sarīrasuddhi pariḷāhūpasamo kāyautuggāhāpananti evamādi.
tika-s0202t0:331_6: Sāsanaṃ nissāya ānisaṃso pana saṅkhepato vaṭṭadukkhūpasamo,
tika-s0202t0:331_9: Vuttappakāro ānisaṃso hoti tāni bhayāni abhibhuyya pavattassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t0:331_10: Imāni abhāyitvāti imāni kodhūpāyāsādibhayāni abhibhuyya pavattitvā abhāyitvā.
tika-s0202t0:331_11: Kodhūpāyāsādayo hi bhāyati etasmāti bhayanti vuttā.
tika-s0202t0:331_14: sammādiṭṭhiyā pana saṃkilesavodānadhammesu kiccaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ katvā dassetuṃ samānakālikampi asamānakālikaṃ
tika-s0202t0:331_15: viya vuttaṃ “taṇhāsotaṃ chinditvā nibbānapāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:334_1: Yattha bodhisattapamukho vānaro naḷakena pānīyaṃ pivi,
tika-s0202t0:334_5: idha pana gāmo adhippetoti āha “naḷakapāneti evaṃnāmake gāme”ti.
tika-s0202t0:334_6: Idāni tamatthaṃ āgamanato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “pubbe kirā”ti āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:335_1: “Udakarakkhaso aha”nti vatvā vānarānaṃ kañci amuñcitvā “sabbe tumhe mama hatthagatā”ti dassento “tumhe pana sabbe khādissāmī”ti āha. Dhami…pe…
tika-s0202t0:335_2: piviṃsūti bodhisattena gahitanaḷo anavaseso abbhantare sabbasandhīnaṃ nibbādhena ekacchiddo ahosi.
tika-s0202t0:335_3: Neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasīti udakarakkhasa tvaṃ vadhitukāmopi mama purisathāmena na vadhissasi.
tika-s0202t0:336_0: Evaṃ pana vatvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ pāpo ettha pānīyaṃ pivante aññepi satte mā bādhayitthā”ti karuṇāyamāno
tika-s0202t0:336_1: “ettha jāyantā naḷā sabbe apabbabandhā ekacchiddāva hontū”ti adhiṭṭhāya gato.
tika-s0202t0:337_1: Anuruddhappamukhā bhikkhū bhagavatā “kacci tumhe anuruddhā”ti pucchitāti thero “taggha mayaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:338_2: no aññathāti raññā pabbajjāya abhinītāti rājābhinītā.
tika-s0202t0:339_2: viviccitvā vivitto hutvā vinā hutvāti attho.
tika-s0202t0:339_5: Yadaggena hi pabbajitakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti tadaggena samaṇabhāvakarampi kiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0202t0:340_1: Appaṭisandhike tāva byākaronto pavattīsu ṭhānaṃ atītoti katvā upapattīsu byākaroti nāma tattha paṭisandhiyā abhāvakittanato.
tika-s0202t0:341_2: Imassa ṭhitassa āyasmato sāmaṃ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavasuto vāti yojanā.
tika-s0202t0:341_4: samādhi pana evaṃvihārīti ettha vihārasaddena gahito.
tika-s0202t0:341_5: Evaṃvimuttāti ettha pana vimuttisaddena phalavimutti gahitā.
tika-s0202t0:341_7: Upāsakaupāsikāṭhānesu labbhamānampi arahattaṃ appakabhāvato pāḷiyaṃ anuddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:344_1: Padasamācāroti taṃtaṃpaccayabhedadassanāya vigatattā pakārehi daliddasamācāro sithilasamācāroti attho.
tika-s0202t0:344_2: Yasmā pana tādiso samācāro thiro daḷho nāma na hoti,
tika-s0202t0:344_7: Paccayesu sāpekkhoti paccayesu sāpekkhatāya eva hissa oḷārikācāratā veditabbā.
tika-s0202t0:344_8: Garunā kismiñci vutte gāravavasena patissavanaṃ patisso,
tika-s0202t0:344_9: patissavacanabhūtaṃ taṃsabhāgañca yaṃ kiñci gāravanti attho.
tika-s0202t0:344_14: tena saha patissenāti sabbaṃ pubbe viya.
tika-s0202t0:345_1: Garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ antaraṃ anāpucchā anupavisitvāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:346_3: na pacchā paṭikkamitabbanti adhippāyena atikāle ca gāmappaveso atidivā paṭikkamanañca nivāritaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:347_0: Paññavatāti iminā bhikkhusāruppesu itikattabbesu upāyapaññā adhippetā,
tika-s0202t0:347_2: Abhidhamme abhivinaye yogoti iminā bhāvanāpaññāuttarimanussadhamme yogo pakāsito.
tika-s0202t0:348_1: tā pana catūhi rūpasamāpattīhi vinā na sampajjantīti āha –
tika-s0202t0:348_4: Ekaṃ parikammakammaṭṭhānanti yaṃ kiñci ekabhāvanā parikammadīpanaṃ khandhakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:348_7: lokiyā uttarimanussadhammā heṭṭhā gahitāti āha “uttarimanussadhammeti iminā sabbepi lokuttaradhamme dassetī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:348_8: Neyyapuggalassa vasenāti jānitvā vitthāretvā ñātabbapuggalassa vasenāti.
tika-s0202t0:352_6: Kathaṃ te tattha nibandhāti āha “akataṃ senāsana”ntiādi.
tika-s0202t0:352_7: Uppajjanakena kālena pattabbaṃ kālikaṃ so pana kālo anāgato eva hotīti āha “anāgate kāle pattabba”nti.
tika-s0202t0:353_0: 178. Ettakā vedanā sevitabbāti aṭṭhārasapi nekkhammanissitā vedanā sevitabbā, gehassitā na sevitbbā.
tika-s0202t0:354_4: Samānaṃ kurumānāti omattataṃ adhimattatañca pahāya samakiccataṃ sampādentā.
tika-s0202t0:355_0: 182. Te dve hontīti te ādito vuttā dve.
tika-s0202t0:356_0: Ubhato ubhayathā ubhohi bhāgehi vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto ekadesasarūpekasesanayena.
tika-s0202t0:356_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti.
tika-s0202t0:356_6: “ayaṃ ubhatobhāgavimutto rūpato muccitvā nāmaṃ nissāya ṭhito puna tato muccanato nāmanissitako”ti vatvā tassa ca sādhakaṃ –
tika-s0202t0:361_0: Imaṃ suttapadaṃ vatvā “nāmakāyato ca rūpakāyato ca suvimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti vadanti.
tika-s0202t0:361_1: Sutte hi ākiñcaññāyatanalābhino upasivabrāhmaṇassa bhagavatā nāmakāyā vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimuttoti akkhātoti.
tika-s0202t0:361_3: maggena samucchedavimokkhena ekavāraṃ vimuttoti evaṃ ubhatobhāgavimutto”ti vadanti.
tika-s0202t0:361_4: Ettha paṭhamavāde dvīhi bhāgehi vimuttoti ubhatobhāgavimutto.
tika-s0202t0:361_6: Tatiyavāde pana dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0202t0:361_7: Kilesehi vimutto kilesā vā vikkhambhanasamucchedehi kāyadvayato vimuttā assāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:362_1: Kāmañcettha rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānampi arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ viya duvaṅgikaṃ āneñjappattanti vuccati.
tika-s0202t0:362_2: Taṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma na hoti rūpakāyato avimuttattā.
tika-s0202t0:362_5: tasmā tato vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto na hotīti āha –
tika-s0202t0:362_8: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādike nirodhasamāpattiante aṭṭha vimokkhe vatvā –
tika-s0202t0:362_10: bhikkhu ime aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
tika-s0202t0:362_11: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti,
tika-s0202t0:362_14: taṃ pana ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭhavasena vuttanti idha sabbaubhatobhāgavimuttasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ “pañcavidho hotī”ti vatvā “pāḷi panettha…pe…
tika-s0202t0:362_21: Yathāvuttesu hi pañcasu purimā cattāro nirodhaṃ na samāpajjantīti pariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttā nāma.
tika-s0202t0:362_22: Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī anāgāmī taṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattoti nippariyāyena ubhatobhāgavimuttaseṭṭho nāma.
tika-s0202t0:363_4: Aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharatīti aṭṭha samāpattiyo sahajātanāmakāyena paṭilabhitvā viharati.
tika-s0202t0:363_5: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti vipassanāpaññāya saṅkhāragataṃ,
tika-s0202t0:363_6: maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni passitvā cattāropi āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:364_1: na tassā patiṭṭhānabhūtena aṭṭhavimokkhasaṅkhātena sātisayena samādhināti paññāvimutto.
tika-s0202t0:364_2: Yo ariyo anadhigataaṭṭhavimokkhena sabbaso āsavehi vimutto,
tika-s0202t0:364_4: Adhigatepi hi rūpajjhānavimokkhe na so sātisayasamādhinissitoti na tassa vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto hotīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0202t0:364_5: Arūpajjhānesu pana ekasmimpi sati ubhatobhāgavimuttoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0202t0:364_6: Tena hi aṭṭhavimokkhekadesena taṃnāmadānasamatthena aṭṭhavimokkhalābhītveva vuccati.
tika-s0202t0:364_7: Samudāye hi pavatto vohāro avayavepi dissati yathā “sattisayo”ti.
tika-s0202t0:364_10: Aṭṭhavimokkhapaṭikkhepavasenevāti avadhāraṇena idhāpi paṭikkhepavaseneva āgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:365_5: Yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto,
tika-s0202t0:365_6: tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti,
tika-s0202t0:365_8: nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikato hoti,
tika-s0202t0:365_9: tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ nirodhaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchikarotīti “kāyasakkhī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0202t0:365_10: na tu “vimutto”ti ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:365_13: Ayaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ ekekato vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā kāyasakkhibhāvaṃ pattānaṃ catunnaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:365_14: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya aggamaggappattaanāgāmino ca vasena ubhatobhāgavimutto viya pañcavidho nāma hoti.
tika-s0202t0:366_0: Diṭṭhantaṃ pattoti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t0:366_2: Etena catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhassa pattataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0202t0:366_11: catūhi rūpajjhānehi vuṭṭhāya diṭṭhippattabhāvappattā cattāro cāti pañcavidho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-s0202t0:366_15: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ dukkhasaccanti yāthāvato pajānāti.
tika-s0202t0:366_16: Yasmā pana taṇhā dukkhaṃ janeti nibbatteti,
tika-s0202t0:366_18: tasmā naṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti yasmā pana idaṃ dukkhaṃ samudayo ca nibbānaṃ patvā nirujjhati appavattiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0202t0:366_20: Ariyo pana aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo taṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0202t0:367_0: Saddhāya vimuttoti etena sabbathā avimuttassapi saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvo dīpito hoti.
tika-s0202t0:367_3: Saddahantassāti “ekaṃsato ayaṃ paṭipadā kilesakkhayaṃ āvahati sammāsambuddhena bhāsitattā”ti evaṃ saddahantassa.
tika-s0202t0:367_4: Yasmā panassa aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññāpahānavasena bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ passato tattha tattha paccakkhatāpi atthi,
tika-s0202t0:367_7: Ettha ca pubbabhāgamaggabhāvanāti vacanena āgamanīyapaṭipadānānattena saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ paññānānattaṃ hotīti dassitaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:367_10: “āgamanīyanānatteneva saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:368_0: Paññāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ adhimattatāya pubbaṅgamaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ anussaratīti dhammānusārī.
tika-s0202t0:368_2: Saddhaṃ anussarati saddhāpubbaṅgamaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetīti imamatthaṃ “eseva nayo”ti atidisati.
tika-s0202t0:368_10: Nanu ca aṭṭhasamāpattilābhivasena ubhatobhāgavimutto kāyasakkhīādayo ca abhidhamme āgatā,
tika-s0202t0:369_1: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti na āsavā paññāya passīyanti,
tika-s0202t0:369_2: dassanakāraṇā paññāya parikkhīṇā “disvā paññāya parikkhīṇā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0202t0:369_3: Dassanāyattaparikkhayattā eva hi dassanaṃ āsavānaṃ khayassa purimakiriyā hotīti.
tika-s0202t0:369_4: Tathāgatena paveditāti bodhimaṇḍe nisīditvā tathāgatena paṭividdhā viditā pacchā paresaṃ pākaṭīkatā.
tika-s0202t0:369_5: “Catusaccadhammā”ti vatvā tadantogadhattā sīlādīnaṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlaṃ kathita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:369_6: Atthenāti avippaṭisārādipayojanena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pītiādikena atthena.
tika-s0202t0:369_7: Kāraṇenāti sappurisūpanissayādinā kāraṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samādhiādipadaṭṭhānatāya sīlādi kāraṇe.
tika-s0202t0:369_10: tesu tena paññā suṭṭhu carāpitāti attho.
tika-s0202t0:370_2: na tattha kiñci niddhāretvā vattabbaṃ atthīti suttantapariyāyena avuttaṃ vadati.
tika-s0202t0:370_5: Upari pana tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ atthāya sevamānā anulomasenāsanaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:370_7: samannānayamānā indriyāni anupubbena bhāvanāmaggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti maggassa anekacittakkhaṇikatāyāti
tika-s0202t0:371_0: Imameva pāḷiṃ gahetvāti “katamo ca puggalo saddhānusārī”ti maggaṭṭhe puggale vatvā “imassa kho ahaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:371_1: bhikkhave”tiādinā tesaṃ vasena anulomasenāsanasevanādīnaṃ vuttattā imameva yathāvuttaṃ pāḷipadesaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0202t0:371_3: So vattabboti so vitaṇḍavādī evaṃ vattabbo.
tika-s0202t0:371_4: Yadi maggaṭṭhapuggale vatvā anulomikasenāsanasevanādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti maggasamaṅgino eva hutvā te tathā paṭipajjanti,
tika-s0202t0:371_5: evaṃ sante senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttarūpādivipassanaggahaṇasmiṃ tava matena maggasamaṅgino eva āpajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0202t0:371_7: tasmā suttaṃ me laddhanti yaṃ kiñci mā kathehīti vāretabbo.
tika-s0202t0:371_9: Tattha evaṃ santeti nānācitteneva senāsanapaṭisevanādike sati.
tika-s0202t0:371_10: Tattha pāḷiyaṃ yadi lokuttaradhammasamaṅgino eva pañcaviññāṇasamaṅgikālepi lokuttarasamaṅgitaṃ sace sampaṭicchasi,
tika-s0202t0:372_9: Sādhukaṃ katvā dhāretīti yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ vācuggatakaraṇavasena taṃ paguṇaṃ katvā sāravasena dhāreti.
tika-s0202t0:372_10: Chando jāyatīti dhammesu nijjhānakkhamesu ime dhamme bhāvanāpaññāya paccakkhato ussāmīti kattukamyatākusalacchando jāyati.
tika-s0202t0:372_11: Ussahatīti chando uppādamatte aṭṭhatvā tato bhāvanārambhavasena ussahati.
tika-s0202t0:372_13: Tīraṇavipassanāya tulayantoti tīraṇapariññāya jānitvā upari pahānapariññāya vasena paritulayanto paṭijānanto.
tika-s0202t0:372_14: Maggapadhānaṃ padahatīti maggalakkhaṇaṃ padhānikaṃ maggaṃ padahati.
tika-s0202t0:372_17: Na pana kiñci āhāti dūratāya samānaṃ na kiñci vacanaṃ bhagavā āha te daḷhataraṃ niggaṇhituṃ.
tika-s0202t0:373_4: Tanti idaṃ idha adhippetaṃ paṇo paṇaviyaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-s0202t0:373_6: sāyañceva bhuñjāmā”ti assajipunabbasukehi vuttaṃ sikkhāya avattanabhāvadīpanavacanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0202t0:374_8: Taco ekaṃ aṅganti taco vīrapakkhabhāve ekamaṅgaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:374_9: Padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi tace palujjamānepi taṃnimittaṃ avosānaṃ anāpajjanakasseva vīriyassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:378_4: ayaṃ panettha āgatapubbataṃ upādāya tathā vutto.
tika-s0202t0:378_19: tiṭṭhaṃ nāgo samāhito”ti idaṃ suttapadaṃ kathanti?
tika-s0202t0:379_1: Yāvadevāti idaṃ yathāruci pavatti viya aparāparuppattipi icchitabbāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha –
tika-s0202t0:379_3: Paccuppannajānanaguṇanti idaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paribhaṇḍañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ anādiyitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:379_4: tassa pana vasena anāgataṃsañāṇaguṇaṃ dassetīti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-s0202t0:380_3: Sati pana dukkhassantakiriyāya gihiliṅge te na tiṭṭhantiyevāti dassento “yepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t0:380_5: Arahattaṃ pattadivaseyeva pabbajanaṃ vā parinibbānaṃ vāti ayaṃ nayo na sabbasādhāraṇoti āha “bhūmadevatā pana tiṭṭhantī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:381_1: Karato na karīyati pāpanti evaṃ na kiriyaṃ paṭibāhati.
tika-s0202t0:381_3: atha kasmā mahāsatto tadā ājīvakapabbajjaṃ upagacchīti āha “tadā kirā”tiādi.
tika-s0202t0:381_4: Tassapīti na kevalaṃ aññesaṃ eva pāsaṇḍānaṃ, tassapi.
tika-s0202t0:381_5: Vīriyaṃ na hāpesīti tapojigucchavādaṃ samādiyitvā ṭhito virāgatthāya taṃ samādiṇṇavattaṃ na pariccaji,
tika-s0202t0:384_1: Lokassa sassatatāpavattipaṭikkhepavasena pavatto vādo ucchedavādo eva hotīti sassataggāhābhāve ucchedaggāhabhāvato
tika-s0202t0:384_2: puna paribbājakena “asassato loko”ti vadantena ucchedaggāho pucchito,
tika-s0202t0:384_3: bhagavatāpi so eva paṭikkhittoti āha “dutiye nāhaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiko”ti.
tika-s0202t0:384_4: Antānantikādivasenāti ettha antānantikaggahaṇena antavā loko anantavā lokoti imaṃ vādadvayamāha. Ādi-
tika-s0202t0:384_8: catutthe nāhaṃ anantavādiṭṭhiko”ti evamādinā paṭikkhepo veditabbo.
tika-s0202t0:384_12: “Na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti ayampi ucchedavādo,
tika-s0202t0:386_0: Kiñci diṭṭhigatanti imā tāva aṭṭha diṭṭhiyo mā hontu,
tika-s0202t0:386_4: Na hi tāya diṭṭhiyā vinā kañci samayaṃ pavattetuṃ yujjatīti adhippāyena pucchati.
tika-s0202t0:386_6: Paññāya diṭṭhanti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya bhagavatā paṭividdhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:386_8: taṃ sattaṃ mathenti sammaddantīti mathitāti āha “mathitānanti tesaṃyeva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0202t0:387_1: Na upetīti saṅkhaṃ na gacchatīti atthoti āha “na yujjatī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:387_2: Anujānitabbaṃ siyā anupādāvimuttassa kañcipi uppattiyā abhāvato.
tika-s0202t0:387_3: “Evaṃ vimuttacitto na upapajjatī”ti kāmañcetaṃ sabhāvapavedanaṃ parinibbānaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:387_4: eke pana ucchedavādino “mayampi ‘satto āyatiṃ na upapajjatī’ti vadāma,
tika-s0202t0:387_5: samaṇo gotamopi tathā vadatī”ti ucchedabhāveyeva patiṭṭhahissanti,
tika-s0202t0:387_6: tasmā bhagavā “na upapajjatīti kho vaccha na upetī”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:387_10: Anālamboti tesaṃyeva vādānaṃ olambārammaṇassa abhāvena anālambo.
tika-s0202t0:387_11: Sukhapavesanaṭṭhānanti tesaññeva vādānaṃ sukhapavesanokāsaṃ mā labhatūti.
tika-s0202t0:387_12: Ananuññāya ṭhatvāti “na upapajjatī”tiādinā anujānitabbāya paṭiññāya ṭhānahetu.
tika-s0202t0:387_14: Pariyatto pana dhammo atthato paccayākāro evāti āha “dhammoti paccayākāradhammo”ti.
tika-s0202t0:387_15: Aññattha payogenāti imamhā niyyānikasāsanā aññasmiṃ micchāsamaye pavattappayogena,
tika-s0202t0:389_8: Dujjānoti agādhatāya gambhīro “ettakāni udakaḷhakasatānī”tiādinā pametuṃ na sakkāti appameyyo,
tika-s0202t0:389_10: Evamevānti yathā mahāsamuddo gambhīro appameyyo dujjāno,
tika-s0202t0:389_12: tasmā ayaṃ rūpādiṃ gahetvā rūpītiādivohāro bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t0:389_13: parinibbutassa pana tadabhāvā tathā paññāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0202t0:389_14: tato taṃ ārabbha upapajjatītiādi na yujjeyya.
tika-s0202t0:389_15: Yathā pana vijjamāno eva jātavedo byattena purisena nīyamāno puratthimādidisaṃ gatoti vucceyya,
tika-s0202t0:390_1: Tena yathā so sālarukkho sākhāpalāsādiasārāpagamena suddho sāre patiṭṭhito,
tika-s0202t0:390_2: evamayaṃ dhammavinayo sāsavasaṅkhātaasāravigamena lokuttaradhammasāre patiṭṭhitoti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:393_2: “mayaṃ pucchāvasena tumhe vissajjanavasenā”ti evaṃ sahapavattakathoti attho.
tika-s0202t0:393_5: dutiye agginā dassitanti tevijjavacchasuttaṃ aggivacchasuttanti nāmaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:393_8: hetusamuppannāpi na cirena nijjhānaṃ khamanti, na lahuṃ.
tika-s0202t0:393_12: Yaṭṭhiṃ ālambitvā udakaṃ tarituṃ otaranto puriso “yaṭṭhiṃ otaritvā udake patamāno”ti vutto.
tika-s0202t0:393_15: Vitthārasadisāti kammapathavasena idha desitadesanāva mūlavasena desitadesanaṃ upādāya vitthārasadisā.
tika-s0202t0:393_16: Vitthāradesanā nāma natthīti na kevalaṃ ayameva,
tika-s0202t0:393_17: atha kho sabbāpi buddhānaṃ nippariyāyena ujukena niravasesato vitthāradesanā nāma natthi desanāñāṇassa
tika-s0202t0:393_18: mahāvisayatāya karaṇasampattiyā ca tajjāya mahānubhāvattā sabbaññutaññāṇassa.
tika-s0202t0:393_21: vitthāriyamānā bhagavato desanā kathaṃ parimitā paricchinnā bhaveyya,
tika-s0202t0:393_22: mahākāruṇikatāya pana bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tattha tattha parimitaṃ paricchinnaṃ katvā niṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0202t0:393_24: Sabbaṃ saṃkhittameva attajjhāsayavasena akathetvā bodhaneyyapuggalajjhāsayavasena desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0202t0:393_25: Na cettha dhammasāsanavirodho pariyāyaṃ anissāya yathādhammaṃ dhammānaṃ bodhitattā sabbalahuttā cāti.
tika-s0202t0:395_4: tathā hi paribbājako “tiṭṭhatu bhavaṃ gotamo”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:396_2: Tasmiṃ byākateti tasmiṃ “ekabhikkhupi sāvako”tiādinā suṭṭhu pañhe kathite.
tika-s0202t0:398_1: Sekhāya vijjāyāti sekhalakkhaṇappattāya maggapaññāya sātisayaṃ katvā karaṇavasena vuttā,
tika-s0202t0:398_2: phalapaññā pana tāya pattabbattā kammabhāvena vuttā.
tika-s0202t0:398_4: Imaṃ panettha aviparītamatthaṃ pāḷito eva viññāyamānaṃ appaṭivijjhanato vitaṇḍavādī “yāvatakaṃ sekhena pattabbaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:398_5: anuppattaṃ taṃ mayā”ti vacanalesaṃ gahetvā “arahattamaggopi anena pattoyevā”ti vadati.
tika-s0202t0:399_0: Kilesāni pahāya pañcāti pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanasaṅkhāte saṃkilese pahāya pajahitvā,
tika-s0202t0:399_4: Na hi yassa phātigatehi sīlādidhammehi parihāni atthi,
tika-s0202t0:400_1: na sekhabhāvāvahāti so ekantaparipuṇṇe sekho vutto.
tika-s0202t0:400_2: Etaṃ na buddhavacananti “maggo bahucittakkhaṇiko”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ na buddhavacanaṃ anantarekantavipākadānato,
tika-s0202t0:400_5: na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yantī”ti evamādīni suttapadāni etassatthasādhakāni.
tika-s0202t0:400_6: Orambhāgiyasaṃyojanappahānena sekkhadhammaparipūribhāvassa vuttatāya attho tava vacanena virujjhatīti.
tika-s0202t0:401_1: Abhiññā vā kāraṇanti yañhi taṃ tatra tatra sakkhibhabbatāsaṅkhātaṃ iddhividhapaccanubhavanādi,
tika-s0202t0:401_6: Ettha ca yasmā paṭhamasutte āsavakkhayo adhippeto,
tika-s0202t0:401_13: Tato eva hi “arahattaṃ vā kāraṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:401_15: yadariyā etarahi upasampajja viharantī”ti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā abhiññā nibbattentassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:401_16: tayidaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ na hotīti sādhāraṇavasena naṃ dassento “arahattassa vipassanā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:402_2: Pariciṇṇo hoti sāvakena nāma satthu dhamme kattabbā paricariyā sammadeva niṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0202t0:405_3: sūkarassa vā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde paṭhamaṃ khataṃ upādāya sūkarakhatā, tāya.
tika-s0202t0:405_6: Otaritvā abhiruhitabbanti pakatibhūmito anekehi sopānaphalakehi otaritvā puna leṇadvāraṃ katipayehi abhiruhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:406_0: Ṭhitakovāti mātulassa ṭhitattā tattha sagāravasapatissavasena ṭhitakova.
tika-s0202t0:406_3: vatthuadhippāyānurodhī pana saddappayogoti tamatthaṃ sandhāya paribbājako “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:406_5: tā anatthasamudāgatā tattha tattheva sattānaṃ ucchijjanato,
tika-s0202t0:406_6: tasmā samayavādīhi vuccamānā sabbā āyatiṃ uppajjanaupapatti na hoti.
tika-s0202t0:406_7: Jalabubbuḷakā viya hi ime sattā tattha tattha samaye uppajjitvā bhijjanti,
tika-s0202t0:406_8: tesaṃ tattha paṭisandhi natthīti assa adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t0:406_10: Assa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvāti yenādhippāyena paribbājako “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti āha,
tika-s0202t0:406_11: taṃ tassa adhippāyaṃ jānantopi ajānanto viya hutvā tassa akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassentoti padesasabbaṃ sandhāya tena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:406_14: taṃ musā”ti vutte tassa vacanassa sabbantogadhattā musābhāvo āpajjeyya,
tika-s0202t0:406_15: evaṃ imassapi “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti vadato tathā pavattā diṭṭhipi nakkhamatīti atthato āpannameva hoti.
tika-s0202t0:406_18: Yathā pana kenaci “sabbaṃ vuttaṃ musā”ti vutte adhippāyānurodhinī saddappavatti,
tika-s0202t0:406_19: tassa vacanaṃ muñcitvā tadaññesameva musābhāvo ñāyāgato,
tika-s0202t0:406_20: evamidhāpi “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti vacanato yassā diṭṭhiyā vasena “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti tena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:406_21: taṃ diṭṭhiṃ muñcitvā tadaññameva yathādhippetaṃ sabbaṃ nakkhamatīti ayamattho ñāyāgato,
tika-s0202t0:406_22: bhagavā pana vādīvaro sukhumāya āṇiyā thūlaṃ āṇiṃ nīharanto viya upāyena tassa diṭṭhigataṃ nīharituṃ
tika-s0202t0:406_23: tassa adhippāyena avatvā saddavasena tāva labbhamānaṃ dosaṃ dassento “yāpi kho te”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t0:406_25: “assa adhippāyaṃ muñcitvā akkhare tāva dosaṃ dassento”ti.
tika-s0202t0:407_0: Paribbājako pana yaṃ sandhāya “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti mayā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:407_1: “ayaṃ so”ti yathāvuttadosapariharaṇatthaṃ tasmiṃ atthe vuccamāne esa doso sabbo na hoti,
tika-s0202t0:407_2: evampi samaṇo gotamo mama vāde dosameva āropeyyāti attano ajjhāsayaṃ niguhitvā yathāvuttadosaṃ pariharitukāmo “esā me”tiādimāha.
tika-s0202t0:407_3: Tattha tampassa tādisamevāti yaṃ “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti gahitaṃ vatthu,
tika-s0202t0:407_7: Yasmā pana “esāpi diṭṭhi tuyhaṃ nakkhamatī”ti yāpi diṭṭhi vuttā bhavatā gotamena,
tika-s0202t0:407_9: tasmā sabbaṃ me nakkhamatevāti paribbājakassa adhippāyo. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:407_11: Tathā ca vakkhati “tasmāpi ucchedadiṭṭhi mayhaṃ nakkhamatī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:407_13: tāya “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti panettha sabbaggahaṇena gahitattā āha –
tika-s0202t0:407_14: “atthato panassa esā diṭṭhi na me khamatīti āpajjatī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:407_18: Tena hi diṭṭhiakkhamena arucitena bhavitabbanti sati diṭṭhiyā akkhamabhāve tato tāya gahitāya khameyya rucceyya yathā,
tika-s0202t0:407_19: evaṃ sabbassa akkhamabhāveti aparabhāge sabbaṃ khamati ruccatīti āpajjati.
tika-s0202t0:407_20: Na panesa taṃ sampaṭicchatīti esa “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti evaṃ vadanto ucchedavādī taṃ vuttanayena sabbassa khamanaṃ ruccanaṃ na sampaṭicchati.
tika-s0202t0:407_21: Ñāyena vuttamatthaṃ kathaṃ na sampaṭicchatīti āha “kevalaṃ tassāpi ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ucchedameva gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:407_22: Sabbesañhi dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ uppādaṃ aruccitvā taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ “sabbaṃ me nakkhamatī”ti vadati,
tika-s0202t0:408_1: yasmā idhekacce sattā īdisaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0202t0:408_3: Pajahanakena vā cittena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā pajahanakehi appajahanake niddhāretuṃ bhagavā “ato…pe…
tika-s0202t0:408_7: atha kho ativiya bahūti dassento “bahutarā”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:408_13: Anissakkavacanaṃ tāva tassa pajahanakānaṃ bahubhāvato tepi parato “bahutarā”ti vuccīyanti.
tika-s0202t0:408_14: Mūladassananti ye tādisaṃ dassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ upādiyanti,
tika-s0202t0:408_16: Vijātiyañhi paṭhamaṃ gahitadassanaṃ appahāya vijātiyassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati viruddhassa abhinivesassa saha anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0202t0:408_17: Aviruddhaṃ pana mūladassanaṃ avissajjitvā visayādibhedabhinnaṃ aparadassanaṃ gahetuṃ labbhati.
tika-s0202t0:409_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ekaccasassatavādo sassatucchedābhinivesānaṃ vasena yathākkamaṃ sassatucchedaggāhanajātiko,
tika-s0202t0:409_1: ucchedaggāhena pana sassatābhinivesassa taṃgāhena ca asassatābhinivesassa virujjhanato ubhayatthapi “ekaccasassataṃ vā gahetuṃ na sakkā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:409_2: tathā “sassataṃ vā ucchedaṃ vā na sakkā gahetu”nti ca.
tika-s0202t0:409_4: Āyatanesupi yojetabbanti paṭhamaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ sassatanti gahetvā aparabhāge na kevalaṃ cakkhāyatanameva sassataṃ,
tika-s0202t0:409_9: Idaṃ sandhāyāti “mūle sassata”ntiādinā vuttapaṭhamaggāhassa samānajātiyaṃ aparaggāhaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0202t0:410_1: Tattha ādīnavaṃ disvāti “yadi rūpaṃ sassataṃ siyā,
tika-s0202t0:410_3: Yasmā ca kho idaṃ rūpaṃ asassataṃ,
tika-s0202t0:410_4: tasmā abhiṇhapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena udayavayavantatāya rūpaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:410_5: sassatābhiniveso micchā”tiādinā tattha sassatavāde ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ disvā.
tika-s0202t0:410_6: Oḷārikanti tasmā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena ayāthāvaggāhatāya rūpaṃ na saṇhaṃ oḷārikameva.
tika-s0202t0:411_3: bhavābhavadiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena imesaṃ sattānaṃ saṃsārato sīsukkhipanaṃ natthīti etāva tisso visesato gahetabbā.
tika-s0202t0:412_0: Idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānātīti ettāvatā sassatadassanassa appasāvajjatākāraṇamāha,
tika-s0202t0:412_4: Idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānātīti iminā tāsu tāsu gatīsu sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipatīti dasseti,
tika-s0202t0:412_5: sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānātīti iminā kammaphalaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:412_7: akusalaṃ karonto na bhāyatīti iminā puññāpuññāni sabhāvato jāyantīti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:412_9: Sīghaṃ laddhiṃ jahituṃ na sakkoti vaṭṭupacchedassa aruccanato.
tika-s0202t0:412_10: Ucchedavādī hi tasmiṃ bhave ucchedaṃ maññati.
tika-s0202t0:412_11: Tato paraṃ idhalokaṃ paralokañca atthīti jānāti sukatadukkaṭānaṃ phalaṃ atthīti jānāti kammaphalavādībhāvato.
tika-s0202t0:412_12: Yebhuyyena hi ucchedavādī sabhāvaniyatiyadicchābhinivesesu aññatrābhiniveso hoti.
tika-s0202t0:412_15: lokavohāramatteneva so sammāsambuddho hutvā parinibbāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0202t0:412_19: tatthāpi tevijjo chaḷabhiñño paṭisambhidāppatto vā sukkhavipassako eva vā buddhasāvako hutvā parinibbāyati.
tika-s0202t0:412_20: Sabbamidaṃ ucchedavādino kalyāṇamittanissayena sammattaniyāmokkamane khippavirāgatādassanatthaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0202t0:413_11: Ādīnavaṃ disvāti etāsaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ evarūpo ādīnavo,
tika-s0202t0:413_12: aniyyānikabhāvatāya pana sampati āyatiñca mahādīnavoti evaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā.
tika-s0202t0:414_2: eso me attā”tiādinā kāyaṃ anvetīti kāyanvayo, soyeva,
tika-s0202t0:415_1: Tena tāsaṃ yathāsakaṃ paccayānaṃ uppajjitvā vigamaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:415_4: Sarūpaṃ aggahetvā “aññā vedanā”ti aniyamena vuttattā tameva vigamaṃ dassento “anuppannāva honti antarahitā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:415_5: Sarūpato niyametvā vuccamāne kāci anuppannā vā hoti,
tika-s0202t0:416_0: Na kenaci saṃvadatīti kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ diṭṭhirāgavasena saṃkiliṭṭhacitto na vadati.
tika-s0202t0:416_2: Na vivadatīti viruddhabhāvo hutvā na vivadati.
tika-s0202t0:416_3: Parivattetvāti ucchedaṃ gahetvā ekaccasassataṃ gahetvā evaṃ vuttanayena tayopi vādā parivattetvā yojetabbā.
tika-s0202t0:416_4: Tena voharatīti tena lokavohārena lokasamaññaṃ anatidhāvanto satto puriso puggalotiādinā voharati,
tika-s0202t0:416_5: na pana ito bāhirakā viya abhinivisati.
tika-s0202t0:416_9: “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā ca dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato āmasitvā gahaṇena aggaṇhanto.
tika-s0202t0:417_1: So vadeyyāti khīṇāsavo bhikkhu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāresu sabbaso samucchinnesupi ahaṃ vadāmīti vadeyya.
tika-s0202t0:417_4: Samaññanti tattha sukusalatāya loke samaññā kusalo viditvā.
tika-s0202t0:417_5: Vohāramattenāti kevalaṃ paccekabuddho hutvā mahābodhipāramiyo pūretuṃ asakkonto sāvako hutvā desavohāramattena
tika-s0202t0:418_3: Sassataṃ abhiññāyāti sassatadiṭṭhiṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato nissaraṇato abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paṭivijjhitvā.
tika-s0202t0:418_6: Anuppādanirodhena niruddhehi āsavehi aggahetvāva cittaṃ vimucci.
tika-s0202t0:418_7: “Āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccī”ti ettha kiñcipi aggahetvā asesetvā.
tika-s0202t0:418_10: kenaci anāmantitameva anekasatānaṃyeva anekasahassānaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ sannipatitatā,
tika-s0202t0:421_3: Etaṃ vuttanti “bhāradvājagottassa brāhmaṇassa agyāgāre tiṇasanthārake”ti etaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:421_4: Na kevalaṃ taṃ divasamevāti yaṃ divasaṃ māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:421_5: na kevalaṃ taṃ divasameva bhagavā yenaññataro vanasaṇḍo,
tika-s0202t0:421_9: Na hi bhagavato tassa saññāṇakaraṇe payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-s0202t0:422_4: Hatthapādasīsehi tattha tattha pahaṭena na calito abhinno,
tika-s0202t0:422_6: Paricchinditvā paññatto viyāti ayaṃ chekena cittakārena cintetvā tulikāya paricchinnalekhāya paricchinditvā likhitā cittakataseyyā viya.
tika-s0202t0:422_10: Taṃ panāyaṃ cakkhādīsu saṃvaravidhānaṃ vaḍḍhihananaṃ maññati.
tika-s0202t0:422_13: Taṃ pana ananubhūtānubhavanena hotīti āha “adiṭṭhaṃ dakkhitabba”nti.
tika-s0202t0:422_14: Anubhūtaṃ pana apaṇītaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabba”nti.
tika-s0202t0:422_17: tasmā evaṃ chasu dvāresu vaḍḍhiṃ paññapeti.
tika-s0202t0:422_18: Yasmā yaṃ channampi cakkhādīnaṃ yathāsakaṃ visayaggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto lokassa avaḍḍhitaṃ vināsameva paññapeti,
tika-s0202t0:423_0: Saṃkilesato ārakattā ariyo niyyānikadhammabhāvato ñāyo dhammo.
tika-s0202t0:423_4: Mukhe ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvāti mukhena saṃyato hutvā.
tika-s0202t0:423_5: Ambajambūādīni gahetvā viya apūrayamānoti ambajambūādīni aññamaññavisadisāni viya pūraṇakathānayena yaṃ kiñci akathetvā.
tika-s0202t0:424_2: Divāvihāropi hi “paṭisallāna”nti vuccati “rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī”tiādīsu.
tika-s0202t0:424_3: Bhagavā hi phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhānuttarakālaṃ tesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā divāvihārato vuṭṭhāya tattha gato.
tika-s0202t0:424_7: So pana yasmā purimāvatthāya calanaṃ hoti cittassa,
tika-s0202t0:425_1: Dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi yathā vineyyadamanakusalo vasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti idaṃ āramitabbabhāvassa bhāvalakkhaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:425_4: tato eva tanninnabhāvena rūpe ratanti rūparataṃ,
tika-s0202t0:425_5: tena sammo duppattiyā rūpena sammuditanti rūpasammuditaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:426_2: Kiṃ vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ assāti rūpārammaṇaṃ anubhavitvā samudayādipahānaṃ pariggaṇhitvā parinibbinditvā virajjitvā yo vimutto,
tika-s0202t0:426_3: tattha kiṃ vuddhihatapariyāyo avassaṃ labhati na labhatīti pucchati.
tika-s0202t0:426_4: Paribbājako tādise sārabaddhavimuttike vuddhihatoti na vadeyyāti āha “na kiñci, bho,
tika-s0202t0:428_0: Nātiucco hoti nātinīcoti gimhiko viya ucco,
tika-s0202t0:428_2: atha kho tadubhayavemajjhalakkhaṇatāya nātiucco hoti nātinīco.
tika-s0202t0:428_6: Uṇhapavesanatthāyāti niyūhesu purebhattaṃ pacchābhattañca patitasūriyobhāsavasena uṇhassa abbhantarapavesanatthāya.
tika-s0202t0:428_7: Bhittiniyūhāni nīharīyantīti dakkhiṇapasse bhittīsu niyūhāni nīharitvā karīyanti.
tika-s0202t0:429_0: Nīluppalagacchake katvāti vikasitehi nīluppalehi gacchake naḷinike katvā.
tika-s0202t0:429_7: Heṭṭhā yantaṃ parivattentīti heṭṭhābhāge udakayantaṃ gamenti.
tika-s0202t0:429_8: Udakaphusite temente vivaṇṇatā māhosīti nīlapaṭaṃ nivāseti.
tika-s0202t0:429_10: Ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto viharāmīti etena attano phalasamāpattivihāro bhagavatā dassitoti āha –
tika-s0202t0:429_11: “tāya ratiyā ramamānoti idaṃ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiratiṃ sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-s0202t0:430_1: Mahā ca nesaṃ papañcoti nesaṃ rājūnaṃ mahāpapañco rājiddhivasena sabbadā sampattivisayo ca,
tika-s0202t0:430_7: Āvaṭṭoti yathādhigate dibbe kāme pahāya kāmahetu āvaṭṭo nivatto parivattito bhaveyya.
tika-s0202t0:430_8: Evaṃ mānusakā kāmāti yathā koci kusaggena udakaṃ gahetvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ mineyya.
tika-s0202t0:430_9: Tattha mahāsamudde udakameva mahantaṃ vipulaṃ paṇītañca,
tika-s0202t0:430_10: evaṃ dibbānaṃ kāmānaṃ samīpe upanidhāya mānusakā kāmā appamattakā oramattakā nihīnā,
tika-s0202t0:430_11: dibbāva kāmā mahantā vipulā uḷārā paṇītā.
tika-s0202t0:430_12: Samadhigayhāti sammā adhigamanavasena niggayha dibbampi sukhaṃ hīnaṃ katvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0202t0:431_2: taṃ panassa rogavigamatovāti āha “paṭhamaṃ dukkhito pacchā sukhito”ti.
tika-s0202t0:431_3: Serī nāma attādhīnavuttīti āha “serī ekako bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-s0202t0:432_7: Āyatiṃ dukkhaphalatāya etarahi ca kilesadukkhabahulatāya kāmānaṃ dukkhasamphassatā,
tika-s0202t0:432_8: tadubhayasaṃyuttesu tesu ca taṃ asallakkhitvā ekantasukhābhiniveso viparītasaññāya,
tika-s0202t0:434_2: diṭṭhadhammikādisabbasampattīnaṃ lābhassa nimittabhāvato ca ārogyaparamā lābhā.
tika-s0202t0:434_4: asati ca nibbānādhigame tādisassa sukhassa anupalabbhanato,
tika-s0202t0:434_6: adhigate ca tasmiṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhābhāvato ca nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:434_8: Tesañca amatagāmitā nāma tanninnatāvaseneva sacchikiriyāvasenāti āha “pubbabhāgagamaneneva amatagāmina”nti.
tika-s0202t0:434_10: taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ sabbaso anupaddutattā taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ sabbaso anupaddavahetuto ca.
tika-s0202t0:434_11: Laddhivasena gahitāti sassatavādādīhi kevalaṃ tesaṃ laddhivasena tathā gahitā.
tika-s0202t0:435_0: 216. Anomajjatīti anu anu omajjati. Aparāparaṃ hatthaṃ heṭṭhā otārento majjati.
tika-s0202t0:437_1: Tattha tattha rujanaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena rogova bhūto.
tika-s0202t0:438_3: Pittādidose pana bhesajjasevanāya nivattento upahataṃ paṭipākatikaṃ karonto cakkhūni uppādeti nāma.
tika-s0202t0:439_2: Vaṭṭe anugatacittenāti anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anādīnavadassitāya anugāmicittena.
tika-s0202t0:443_4: Guhāti paṃsuguhā pāsāṇaguhā missakaguhāti tisso guhā.
tika-s0202t0:443_5: Tattha paṃsuguhā udakamuttaṭṭhāne ahosi ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pana udakena ajjhotthataṃ.
tika-s0202t0:443_7: Anamataggiyaṃ paccavekkhitvāti “na kho so sattāvāso sulabharūpo,
tika-s0202t0:443_8: yo iminā dīghena addhunā anāvuṭṭhapubbo”tiādinā idañca taḷākaṃ mayā vutthapubbaṃ bhavissati,
tika-s0202t0:443_9: tampi ṭhānaṃ so ca attabhāvo apaññattikabhāvaṃ gatoti evaṃ anamataggiyaṃ paccavekkhitvā tādisaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0202t0:444_0: Uccaṃ nadamānāyāti uccaṃ katvā saddaṃ karontiyā kāmassādabhavassādādivatthunti “ayañca ayañca kāmo iṭṭho kanto manāpo,
tika-s0202t0:444_2: evamayaṃ loko piyehi piyataro”ti evaṃ kāmassādabhavassādalokassādādisaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ.
tika-s0202t0:444_3: Duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:444_7: niyyānaṃ vā phalaṃ etissā atthīti niyyānikā,
tika-s0202t0:444_22: visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0202t0:445_1: Vohāro viya tesaṃ tathā vohāramattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “brahmacariyavāse”ti.
tika-s0202t0:445_3: visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā na vihitā.
tika-s0202t0:445_5: Padadvayenapi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ anibbattataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:445_6: Iddhiyāpi na nimmitāti kassaci iddhimato cetovasippattassa devassa,
tika-s0202t0:445_11: Yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci ca anibbattanakaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:445_15: aññathā aññatopi aññassa upaladdhi siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t0:445_22: Vikārābhāvato hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā.
tika-s0202t0:445_23: Aniñjanañca atthato pakatiyā avaṭṭhānamevāti dassetuṃ “na vipariṇāmentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:445_24: Tathā avipariṇāmadhammattā eva te aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti.
tika-s0202t0:445_25: Sati hi vikāraṃ āpādetabbatāya byābādhakatāpi siyā,
tika-s0202t0:445_26: tathā anuggahetabbatāya anuggāhakatāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “nāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:446_1: Hantuṃ vā ghātetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthi jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārabhāvato,
tika-s0202t0:446_2: eteneva nesamahantabbatā aghātetabbatā atthato vuttāyevāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0202t0:446_4: Sotuṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā samattho nāma natthīti paccekaṃ nesaṃ savanesu asamatthattā tadekadesādīsupi asamatthataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0202t0:446_8: hananaghātanādi pana paramatthato nattheva kāyānaṃ avikopanīyabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0202t0:446_9: Kevalaṃ takkamattena niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ dīpetīti etena yasmā takkikā niraṅkusatāya parikappanassa yaṃ
tika-s0202t0:446_10: kiñci attanā parikappitaṃ sārato maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa takkadiṭṭhiggāhaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0202t0:446_11: tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthusmiṃ viññūhi vicāraṇā kattabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:447_7: attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0202t0:447_8: So kira tathābhūto kassacipi dhammaṃ na katheti,
tika-s0202t0:447_10: Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhatī”tiādinā nayena vuttaalābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ.
tika-s0202t0:447_11: Tato eva jighacchādubbalaparetatāya sayanaparāyaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.
tika-s0202t0:448_3: Bahū devāti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena nesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā.
tika-s0202t0:450_0: Aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā paripāceti nāma sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā.
tika-s0202t0:450_1: Paripakkaṃ phussa phussa patvā patvā paripakkabhāvāpādanena byantiṃ karoti nāma.
tika-s0202t0:450_3: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva,
tika-s0202t0:451_1: Niyativāde pakkhipantoti sabbaññutaṃ paṭijānitvāpi padesaññutāya asampāyamāno tattha attano aññāṇakiriyaṃ
tika-s0202t0:451_2: pariharituṃ asakkonto ca “evamesā niyatī”ti niyativāde pakkhipanto.
tika-s0202t0:452_1: Dhammakathāya apassayabhūto anussavo etassa atthīti anussavī,
tika-s0202t0:452_6: tādisaṃ ganthaṃ paguṇaṃ vācuggataṃ katvā taṃ nissāya dhammaṃ katheti.
tika-s0202t0:453_3: “Evantipi me no”tiādinā vividho nānappakāro khepo vācāya paravādānaṃ khīpanaṃ vācāvikkhepo,
tika-s0202t0:453_5: na marati na pacchijjati yathāvutto vādavikkhepo etāyāti amarā,
tika-s0202t0:453_8: Apariyantavikkhepanti “evampi me no”tiādinā pucchitassa apariyosāpanavasena vikkhepaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:453_9: Ito cito ca sandhāvati ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0202t0:453_10: Gāhaṃ na upagacchatīti micchāgāhatāya uttaravidhānāya purimapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā gāhaṃ na upagacchati.
tika-s0202t0:454_4: evaṃ aññasmiṃ yaṃ kiñci kenaci pucchitaṃ atthaṃ attano aruccanatāya “evantipi me no”tiādinā tattha tattha vikkhepaññeva āpajjati,
tika-s0202t0:454_5: tasmā “evantipi me no”tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena vikkhipanākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:454_6: Nanu cettha vikkhepavādino vikkhepapakkhassa ananujānanaṃ vikkhepapakkhe avaṭṭhānaṃ yuttanti? Na,
tika-s0202t0:454_7: tatthāpi tassa sammūḷhassa paṭikkhepavaseneva vikkhepavādassa pavattanato.
tika-s0202t0:454_9: Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho paralokattikādīnaṃ paṭisedhanamukhena vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0202t0:455_1: “nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme paralokattikādīni ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno
tika-s0202t0:455_2: tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho samāno pucchāya vikkhepamattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0202t0:455_4: Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitamatthaṃ ajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā yuttā”ti? Vuccate –
tika-s0202t0:455_5: na heva kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā,
tika-s0202t0:455_7: Sassatābhinivesena micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva hi puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme paralokattikādīni
tika-s0202t0:455_8: ca yāthāvato appaṭipajjamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena
tika-s0202t0:455_10: Atha vā puññapāpānaṃ tabbipākānañca anavabodhena asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇaṃyeva
tika-s0202t0:455_11: sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa uppannā visuṃyeva sā ekā diṭṭhi sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi
tika-s0202t0:456_1: Sannidhikārakaṃ kāmeti ettha anindriyabaddhāni adhippetānīti tilataṇḍulādiggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:456_2: tassa lokassa appasādaparihāratthaṃ kadāci taṇḍulanāḷiādisaṅgahaṇakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:457_1: Ājīvakā matā nāmāti ime ājīvakā sabbaso sammāpaṭipattirahitā micchā eva ca paṭipajjamānā adhisīlasaṅkhātassa sīlajīvitassa abhāvena matā nāma.
tika-s0202t0:457_3: Samaṇe gotame brahmacariyavāso atthīti samaṇaṃ eva gotamaṃ parisuddho suparipuṇṇo takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāvaho brahmacariyavāso atthi.
tika-s0202t0:457_5: aññattha natthīti iminā bāhirakesu tassa abhāvaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:460_1: Abhiññātāti ediso ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā.
tika-s0202t0:460_3: appasaddatāya mandabhāṇitāya vinītoti ca appasaddavinītoti vuccamāne aññena vinītabhāvo dīpito hoti,
tika-s0202t0:461_1: Hiyyodivasaṃ upādāya tato āsannāni katipayāni divasāni purimāni nāma honti,
tika-s0202t0:461_4: Tato paranti yathā vuttaatītadivasato anantaraṃ paraṃ purimataraṃ atisayena purimattā.
tika-s0202t0:461_5: Iti imesu dvīsu pavattito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo,
tika-s0202t0:462_0: Ayathābhūtaguṇehīti ayathābhūtaṃ micchādīpitaatthamatteneva ugghositaguṇehi samuggato ghosito.
tika-s0202t0:462_3: Diṭṭhigatikamaggo pana ayathābhūtopi tesaṃ tathā vitaraṇaṃ upādāya titthanti voharīyatīti taṃ karontā titthakarā.
tika-s0202t0:463_2: Na kiñci jātanti paṭiññādosahetudosaudāharaṇadosaduṭṭhadosatāya na kiñci jātaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:464_1: Pīḷeyyāti madhubhaṇḍena saha bhājane pīḷetvā dadeyya.
tika-s0202t0:466_6: Anappāhāroti na vattabbo kadāci appāhāroti katvā.
tika-s0202t0:466_7: Tattha ativiya aññehi avisayhaṃ appāhārataṃ bhagavato dassetuṃ “padhānabhūmiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:467_8: Alābulomasānīti alābulomāni viya sukhumatarāni cīvarasuttaṃsūni etesaṃ santīti alābulomasāni.
tika-s0202t0:467_10: yaṃ tumbamatte puḷave odhunitvā satthā gaṇhi.
tika-s0202t0:468_0: “Yathāpi bhamaro puppha”ntiādinā vuttaṃ madhukarabhikkhācāravataṃ “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjā”ti
tika-s0202t0:468_1: vacanato bhikkhūnaṃ pakatibhūtaṃ vatanti vuttaṃ “uñchāsake vate ratā”ti. Vata-
tika-s0202t0:468_5: Kabaramissakaṃ bhattaṃ saṃharitvāti kaṇājakamissakaṃ bhattaṃ sampiṇḍitvā.
tika-s0202t0:469_1: Ettha ca yasmā buddhā nāma sadevake loke anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:469_3: tasmā sattānaṃ tādisaṃ upakāraṃ ācikkhitvā te ca anuggaṇhantā gahapaticīvaraṃ sādiyanti,
tika-s0202t0:469_4: catupaccayasantose pana ne paramukkaṃsagatā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:470_1: Sappaccayanti sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ hutvā dhammaṃ desetīti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0202t0:470_5: tañca tassa tassa anuppattiyuttassa atthassa paṭipakkhaharaṇato “sappāṭihāriya”nti vuccatīti āha “purimassevetaṃ vevacana”nti.
tika-s0202t0:471_1: Tassa tassa pañhassāti yaṃ yaṃ pañhaṃ paro abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchati,
tika-s0202t0:471_3: Upari āgamanavādapathanti vissajjane kate tato upari āgacchanakaṃ vādamaggaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:471_6: vattumarahatī”ti attano vādabhedanatthaṃ āhataṃ kāraṇaṃ attano māraṇatthaṃ āvudhaṃ nidassento viya visesetvā vadanto pahārakena vacanena.
tika-s0202t0:471_10: Te niggahetuṃ mayā desitaṃ suttapadaṃ ānetvā mamayeva anusāsaniṃ ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti.
tika-s0202t0:472_4: Sāvakasīlato ca paccekabuddhasīlato ca buddhānaṃ sīlaṃ adhikaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ paramukkaṃsato anaññasādhāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0202t0:472_8: Avasesā paññāti idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatā anāgatā ca yathāvuttañāṇadvayavinimuttā paññā.
tika-s0202t0:473_3: tāsu ukkaṭṭhaniddesena chaḷabhiññārahatova aggamaggapaññā idha abhiññāti adhippetā,
tika-s0202t0:473_4: tassa vosānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāramī paramukkaṃsāti avakaṃsāti ca aggaphalaṃ vuccatīti āha “abhiññā…pe…
tika-s0202t0:474_2: taṃ atthaṃ sādhentiyevāti etassa atthassa dīpako sammā-
tika-s0202t0:474_5: saddassa vā yoniso atthadīpakataṃ sandhāya “yoniso padhāne”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:474_6: Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatākusalacchandaṃ uppādeti pavatteti vā.
tika-s0202t0:474_9: Cittaṃ ukkhipatīti teneva sahajātavīriyena kosajjapakkhato cittaṃ ukkhipati.
tika-s0202t0:474_11: Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāri padāni āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
tika-s0202t0:474_12: “Padahatī”ti vā iminā āsevanādīhi saddhiṃ sikhāpattaṃ ussoḷhivīriyaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:474_14: Yā ṭhitīti yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhavigamena avaṭṭhiti.
tika-s0202t0:474_16: Yaṃ vepullanti yo sabbaso vipulabhāvo mahantatā.
tika-s0202t0:475_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppajjanena anatthāvahatā nāma natthīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0202t0:476_5: Na hi tassa paṭipakkhasamāyogo nāma atthi.
tika-s0202t0:476_7: Paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhatīti iminā maggo sampati āyatiñca ekanteneva atthāvahoti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:476_8: Purimasmimpīti “anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti etasmiṃ tatiyavārepi.
tika-s0202t0:476_11: anuppajjamāne ca tasmiṃ vaṭṭānatthasabbhāvatoti maggassapi sādhāraṇabhāvato na yuttanti paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0202t0:477_2: tasmā “saṅghagāravena yathāruci vandituṃ na labhāmī”ti saṅghena saha na nikkhami.
tika-s0202t0:477_3: Ettakaṃ dhātūnaṃ nidhānaṃ nāma aññatra natthi,
tika-s0202t0:477_4: mahādhātunidhānato hi nīharitvā katipayā dhātuyo tattha tattha cetiye upanītā,
tika-s0202t0:477_5: idha pana rāmagāmathūpe vinaṭṭhe nāgabhavanaṃ paviṭṭhā doṇamattā dhātuyo upanītā.
tika-s0202t0:478_0: Saṃvijjitvāti “kathañhi nāma mādiso īdisaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti saṃvegaṃ janetvā.
tika-s0202t0:478_1: Īdisaṃ nāma mādisaṃ ārabbha vattabbanti kiṃ vadatīti taṃ vacanaṃ anādiyanto.
tika-s0202t0:479_0: Santasamāpattito aññaṃ santhambhanakāraṇaṃ balavaṃ natthīti tato parihīno sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ patiṭṭhā kathaṃ bhavissatīti āha “santāya…pe…
tika-s0202t0:479_2: Na hi mahārajjuyā chinnāya suttatantū santhambhetuṃ sakkontīti.
tika-s0202t0:479_3: Samathe dassetvā tena samānagatikā imasmiṃ visaye vipassanāpīti iminā adhippāyenāha “evaṃ uppannā samathavipassanā…pe…
tika-s0202t0:480_1: Kacchaṃ pīḷetvā nivatthanti pacchimaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ pīḷento viya daḷhaṃ katvā nivatthaṃ addasaṃsūti yojanā.
tika-s0202t0:481_0: Vuttanayenāti “kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā”tiādinā vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavadassanapubbakanekkhammapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0202t0:481_1: chandarāgaṃ vikkhambhayato samucchindantassa ca “anuppanno ca kāmāsavo na uppajjatī”tiādinā heṭṭhā sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanādīsu
tika-s0202t0:481_8: Anubhūtasaddo ca kammavacanicchāya abhāvato anubhavakavācako daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:481_9: Vipāko ārammaṇe uppajjitvā niruddho bhutvāvigatoti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-s0202t0:481_10: vikappagāhavasena rāgādīhi tabbipakkhehi ca akusalaṃ kusalañca kammaṃ ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā vigatanti vattabbataṃ arahati.
tika-s0202t0:481_11: Yathāvutto pana vipāko kevalaṃ ārammaṇarasānubhavanavaseneva pavattatīti anubhavitvā vigatattā nippariyāyeneva vutto,
tika-s0202t0:481_12: tassa ca tathā vuttattā kammaṃ bhavitvā vigatapariyāyena,
tika-s0202t0:481_14: uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti ettha “uppanna”nti gahetvā taṃsadisānaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:481_16: Vipaccituṃ okāsakaraṇavasena uppatitaṃ atītakammañca tato uppajjituṃ āraddho anāgato vipāko ca “okāsakatuppanno”ti vutto.
tika-s0202t0:481_17: Yaṃ uppannasaddena vināpi viññāyamānaṃ uppannaṃ sandhāya “nāhaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:482_1: Anusayitakilesāti anusayavasena pavattā appahīnā maggena pahātabbā kilesā adhippetā.
tika-s0202t0:482_4: Tesañhi ambarukkhopamāya vattamānāditā na vattabbā maggena pahātabbānaṃ tādisassa vibhāgassa anuppajjanato.
tika-s0202t0:482_5: Appahīnāva hontīti iminā appahīnaṭṭhena anusayaṭṭhoti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:482_6: Idaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmāti idaṃ tesu khandhesu uppattirahakilesajātaṃ tāya eva uppattirahatāya bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma,
tika-s0202t0:482_10: Ettha ca laddhabhūmikaṃ bhūmiladdhanti vuttaṃ aggiāhito viya.
tika-s0202t0:483_1: saddepi ca okāso kato etenāti okāso kato etassāti ca atthadvayepi kata-
tika-s0202t0:483_6: Purimanayenevāti avikkhambhituppanne viya “imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantīti na vattabbā. Kasmā?
tika-s0202t0:484_1: Tattha ca maggena pahīnakilesānameva tidhā navattabbataṃ apākaṭaṃ supākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ajātaphalarukkho upamābhāvena āgato.
tika-s0202t0:484_3: Tattha yathā acchinne rukkhe nibbattārahāni phalāni chinne anuppajjamānāni na kadāci sasabhāvāni ahesuṃ
tika-s0202t0:484_4: honti bhavissanti cāti tāni atītādibhāvena na vattabbāni,
tika-s0202t0:485_6: tato pañca ṭhapetvā itare dve “sugatibhavekadesā”ti adhippetā.
tika-s0202t0:485_13: tasmā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnāvasese kilese so pajahati,
tika-s0202t0:485_14: iti imaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ sandhāya “sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevātipi vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:486_0: Hotu tāva vuttanayena anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādāya,
tika-s0202t0:486_2: atha maggakkhaṇe kathaṃ anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya uppannānañca ṭhitiyā bhāvanā hoti ekacittakkhaṇikattā tassāti codeti,
tika-s0202t0:486_6: yaṃ anuppannā kusalā dhammā sātisayaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0202t0:486_9: Kiñcāpi ariyamaggo vattamānakkhaṇe anuppanno nāma na hoti,
tika-s0202t0:486_10: anuppannapubbataṃ upādāya upacāravasena tathā vuccatīti dassetuṃ “anāgatapubbaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:486_11: Ayamevāti ayaṃ maggassa yathāpaccayapavatti eva ṭhiti nāmāti,
tika-s0202t0:486_12: maggasamaṅgī puggalo maggampi bhāvento eva tassa ṭhitiyā bhāvetīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0202t0:487_0: Upasamamānaṃ gacchatīti vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena kilese upasamentaṃ vattati.
tika-s0202t0:488_3: Etena satipi sabbassapi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena
tika-s0202t0:488_4: taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati,
tika-s0202t0:488_8: tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho.
tika-s0202t0:488_10: Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanattho pacchimavimokkhe nirodhe natthi.
tika-s0202t0:489_1: taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t0:489_4: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpanimittaṃ jhānamiva paramatthato rūpībhāvasādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:490_0: Antoappanāyaṃ subhanti ābhogo natthīti iminā pubbābhogavasena adhimutti siyāti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:490_2: Yasmā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimutti siyā,
tika-s0202t0:490_3: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito.
tika-s0202t0:490_4: Yasmā pana mettādivasena pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahati,
tika-s0202t0:490_7: tayidaṃ ubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:491_1: Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasiṭṭhoti.
tika-s0202t0:492_3: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:492_4: Ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0202t0:492_8: Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:492_11: Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati.
tika-s0202t0:492_12: Taṃ pana ajjhatta parikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ asuvisuddhameva hoti,
tika-s0202t0:492_13: na bahiddhā parikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:493_2: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idamabhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:493_4: Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati,
tika-s0202t0:493_6: Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatīti ettha abhibhavanaṃ samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti
tika-s0202t0:494_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti,
tika-s0202t0:494_2: tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārāsevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti,
tika-s0202t0:494_6: nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā,
tika-s0202t0:494_7: tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0202t0:495_0: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato,
tika-s0202t0:495_1: samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:495_2: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “iminā panassa pubbabhāgo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:495_3: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā “jhānasaññāyapī”ti vuttanti āha “abhibhava…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0202t0:496_1: na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhitappamāṇānīti tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato.
tika-s0202t0:497_6: Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-s0202t0:497_7: appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā pana yathā suttante –
tika-s0202t0:497_8: ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:497_9: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti codanaṃ katvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ
tika-s0202t0:497_10: anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā “tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhārūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0202t0:497_11: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni.
tika-s0202t0:497_12: ‘Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:498_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca sabbāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0202t0:498_2: Atthi hi eso pariyāyo “parittāni abhibhuyya tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti.
tika-s0202t0:498_4: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni,
tika-s0202t0:498_6: Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanapariyāyoti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho,
tika-s0202t0:498_9: abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni,
tika-s0202t0:498_10: sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0202t0:498_11: Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato “rūpī
tika-s0202t0:498_12: rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0202t0:499_0: “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhārūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-s0202t0:499_4: yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:499_5: na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:499_6: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā,
tika-s0202t0:499_9: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni na vattabbānīti ce? Na,
tika-s0202t0:499_11: Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā tadappamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:499_13: Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti,
tika-s0202t0:501_0: Te dhammeti te satipaṭṭhānādidhamme ceva aṭṭhavimokkhadhamme ca.
tika-s0202t0:501_1: Ciṇṇavasībhāvāyeva tattha abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya pariyosānuttaraṃ sataṃ gatā abhiññāvosānapāramippattā.
tika-s0202t0:502_2: asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti attho.
tika-s0202t0:502_5: Paricchinditvāti idaṃ uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:502_6: Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:502_7: Tena tena kāraṇenāti upariādīsu tena tena kasiṇena.
tika-s0202t0:502_10: yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo,
tika-s0202t0:502_11: uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti, adho ce, adho,
tika-s0202t0:502_18: Na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-s0202t0:502_21: Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
tika-s0202t0:502_24: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:502_27: Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ karonto.
tika-s0202t0:502_28: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti.
tika-s0202t0:503_5: Evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:503_6: tattakaṃ ākāsameva hutvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā vuttāti
tika-s0202t0:504_3: Paṭibaddhañca tena vinā appavattanato kāyasaññitānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ca.
tika-s0202t0:504_7: Dhovanavedhanādīhīti catūsu pāsāṇesu dhovanena ceva kāḷakādiapaharaṇatthāya suttena āvunanatthāya ca vijjhanena.
tika-s0202t0:505_2: Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu sammadeva tassa dassanato.
tika-s0202t0:505_5: Evañhi tesaṃ vipassanāñāṇagatikattā “āvutasuttaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇa”nti vacanaṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t0:506_4: tasmā lokiyābhiññānaṃ parato chaṭṭhābhiññāya purato vattabbaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:506_6: evaṃ santepi etassa antarā vāro natthīti pañcasu lokiyābhiññāsu kathitāsu ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu viya chaṭṭhābhiññā
tika-s0202t0:506_7: kathetabbāti etassa anabhiññālakkhaṇassa vipassanāñāṇassa tāsaṃ antarā vāro na hoti,
tika-s0202t0:506_8: tasmā tattha avasarābhāvato idheva rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānānantarameva dassitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:506_12: atha kho idampi kāraṇaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa idheva dassaneti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0202t0:506_13: Dibbena cakkhunā bheravarūpaṃ passatoti ettha iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ rūpaṃ nimminitvā cakkhunā passatoti vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:506_14: evampi abhiññālābhino apariññāṇavatthukassa bhayasantāso uppajjati uccavālikavāsīmahānāgattherassa viya.
tika-s0202t0:507_1: Manomayiddhiyaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya abhiññā vosānapāramippattatā veditabbāti yojanā.
tika-s0202t0:507_3: Taṃ sadisabhāvadassanatthamevāti saṇṭhānatopi vaṇṇatopi avayavavisesatopi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva.
tika-s0202t0:509_1: Mando uttānaseyyakadārakopi “daharo”ti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “yuvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:509_2: Yuvāpi koci anicchanato amaṇḍanasīlo hotīti tato visesanatthaṃ “maṇḍanakajātiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:509_12: mukhadoso ca mukhadoso ca mukhadosoti ekasesanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0202t0:509_13: Evañhi paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotīti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0202t0:513_3: pāṭhato attanā yathāuggahitamatthaṃ tabbibhāvanatthāya uccāraṇavasena paresaṃ gāhetunti attho.
tika-s0202t0:513_5: Sā hi saṃyojanabhāvato sameti sambandhā eti pavattati,
tika-s0202t0:513_6: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayoti vuccati.
tika-s0202t0:513_8: Sūriyassa uggamanato atthaṅgamā ayaṃ ettako kālo rattandhakāravidhamanato divā nāma,
tika-s0202t0:513_9: tassa pana majjhimapahārasaññito kālo samujjalitapabhātejadahanabhāvena divā nāma.
tika-s0202t0:513_12: Evaṃ cittassa paṭisaṃharaṇaṃ nāma gocarakkhette ṭhapananti āha “jhānaratisevanavasena ekībhāvaṃ gato”ti.
tika-s0202t0:513_15: te pana yasmā attano sīlādiguṇehi viññūnaṃ manāpā honti (kilesaaniggahassa pañcapasādāyattattā,) tasmā āha “manavaḍḍhanakāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0202t0:514_9: Saṃvarappahānanti pañcasu saṃvaresu yena kenaci saṃvarena saṃvaralakkhaṇaṃ pahānaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:514_13: Eseva nayoti iminā “abhāsanamattameva vadatī”ti evamādiṃ atidisati.
tika-s0202t0:515_1: Sāsane tiṇṇaṃ duccaritānaṃ micchājīvassa vivajjanaṃ vaṇṇīyati,
tika-s0202t0:515_4: vadanto ca sammāsambuddhe dhamme cassa appasādaṃ na dasseti,
tika-s0202t0:515_5: tasmā pasannakārampi vadatīti maññamāno tassa vādaṃ na paṭisedheti.
tika-s0202t0:516_2: evaṃ santeti yathā tassa paribbājakassa vacanaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:516_4: Mayaṃ pana evaṃ na vadāmāti etena samaṇabhāvo nāma evaṃ na hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:516_7: Visesañāṇaṃ na hotīti kāyavisesavisayañāṇaṃ tassa tadā natthi,
tika-s0202t0:516_15: Vikūjitamattāti ettha virūpaṃ kūjitaṃ vikūjitaṃ pubbenivāsasannissayaṃ upayaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:516_16: taṃ panettha rodanahasanasamuṭṭhāpakacittasahagatanti dosasahagataṃ lobhasahagatañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:516_18: Akusalacittaṃ pana atītārammaṇaṃ pavattatīti vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0202t0:516_19: Saritvāti yāva na satisaṇṭhāpanā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-s0202t0:516_20: tāva supinante anubhūtaṃ viya dukkhaṃ saritvā rodanti.
tika-s0202t0:516_22: Ayañca nayo ye laddhasukhārammaṇā hutvā gahitapaṭisandhikā mātukucchitopi sukheneva nikkhamanti,
tika-s0202t0:516_25: Ayampīti ājīvopi mātu aññavihitakāle ca lokassādavasena kilesasahagatacitteneva hoti.
tika-s0202t0:517_1: Samadhigayhāti sammā adhigatabhāvena gahetvā abhibhavitvā visesetvā visiṭṭho hutvā.
tika-s0202t0:518_0: Tīṇi padāni nissāyāti na kāyena pāpakaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
tika-s0202t0:518_2: na pāpakaṃ ājīvaṃ ājīvatīti imāni tīṇi padāni nissāya kusalasīlamūlakā ca akusalasīlamūlakā cāti dve paṭhamacatukkā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0202t0:518_3: Ekaṃ padaṃ nissāyāti na pāpakaṃ saṅkappaṃ saṅkappetīti imaṃ ekapadaṃ nissāya kusalasaṅkappamūlakā akusalasaṅkappamūlakā
tika-s0202t0:520_3: Sā pana heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpattiphalena dīpetabbāti āha “sotāpattiphale bhumma”nti.
tika-s0202t0:520_4: Yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ avasiṭṭhañca sīlaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa ca pārisuddhipātimokkhādhigamena sotāpattiphalappattiyā siddho hotīti āha –
tika-s0202t0:521_1: Kāmāvacarakusalacittameva vuttaṃ sampattasamādānaviratipubbakassa sīlassa adhippetattā. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:523_0: 266. Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttā saññā kāmasaññā. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Itarā dveti byāpādavihiṃsāsaññā.
tika-s0202t0:524_2: Ettha ca ujuvipaccanīkena paṭipakkhappahānaṃ sātisayanti paṭhamajjhānaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:524_4: Nekkhammasaññānaṃ kāmāvacaracittasahagatatā tassa sīlassa samuṭṭhānatā ca sampayuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0202t0:528_4: Yena kāraṇenāti yena tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhitena kāraṇena dhammadesanā upaṭṭhaheyya,
tika-s0202t0:528_5: taṃ pana paribbājakassa ajjhāsayavasena tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:529_1: Sakkaccaṃ sussūsatīti “tathābhūtaṃyeva maṃ tathā avocā”ti sādaraṃ sussūsati.
tika-s0202t0:529_4: dibbena cakkhunā”ti ārabhitvā “so vā maṃ aparantaṃ ārabbha pañhaṃ puccheyyā”ti evaṃ avoca.
tika-s0202t0:531_1: Ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvāti dīghaso heṭṭhimantena caturaṅgulaṃ,
tika-s0202t0:531_2: uparimantena vidatthikaṃ rukkhagacchalatādīsu yassa kassaci ekaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā aññajātikānaṃ adissamānakāyo hoti.
tika-s0202t0:532_1: Na ca atthaṃ dīpeyyāti adhippetamatthaṃ sā vācā sarūpato na ca dīpeyya,
tika-s0202t0:532_11: “dibbo rūpī manomayo sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo attā”ti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0202t0:533_1: Saupasaggapadassa attho upasaggena vināpi viññāyatīti āha “viddheti ubbiddhe”ti.
tika-s0202t0:533_2: Sā cassa ubbiddhatā upakkilesavigamena sucibhāvena upaṭṭhānanti āha “meghavigamena dūrībhūte”ti.
tika-s0202t0:533_3: Indanīlamaṇi viya dibbati jotetīti devo, ākāso.
tika-s0202t0:533_4: “Aḍḍharattasamaye”ti vattabbe bhummatthe vihitavacanānaṃ accantasaṃyogābhāvā upayogavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:533_5: Puṇṇamāsiyañhi gaganamajjhassa purato vā pacchato vā ante ṭhite aḍḍharatte samayo bhinno nāma hoti,
tika-s0202t0:533_6: majjhe eva pana ṭhito abhinno nāma.
tika-s0202t0:534_0: Ye anubhontīti ye devā candimasūriyānaṃ ābhā anubhonti vinibhuñjanti vaḷañjanti ca tehi devehi bahū ceva
tika-s0202t0:534_1: bahutarā ca candimasūriyānaṃ ābhā ananubhonto. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:535_1: Pucchāmūḷho pana jāto “ayaṃ paramo vaṇṇo”ti gahitapadassa vidhamanena.
tika-s0202t0:535_4: Surāmerayapānamanuyuttapuggalassa surāpānato virati tassa kāyaṃ cittañca tāpentī saṃvattatīti surāpānavirati (tapo,
tika-s0202t0:536_3: Na jāniṃsūti sammosena anupaṭṭhahanti tadatthaṃ na bujjhanti.
tika-s0202t0:536_4: Buddhuppādena kira vihatatejāni mahānubhāvāni mantapadāni viya bāhirakānaṃ yogāvacaraganthena saddhiṃ yogāvacarapaṭipadā nassati.
tika-s0202t0:537_1: Ekantasukhassa lokassa paṭilābhena pattiyā tattha nibbatti paṭilābhasacchikiriyā.
tika-s0202t0:537_2: Ekantasukhe loke anabhinibbattitvā eva iddhiyā tattha gantvā tassa sattalokassa bhājanalokassa ca paccakkhato dassanaṃ paccakkhasacchikiriyā.
tika-s0202t0:538_2: Viñjhupabbatapasse gāmānaṃ aniviṭṭhattā tiṃsayojanamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ aṭavī nāma,
tika-s0202t0:538_4: tasmiṃ aṭavisenāsane padhānakammikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūnaṃ tattha nivāsena ekaṃ padhānagharaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0202t0:541_1: Saha vatthukāmena kilesakāmo garu garukātabbo etassāti kāmagaru.
tika-s0202t0:541_3: Pabbajjāpaṭhamajjhānādikaṃ nekkhammaṃ garu garukātabbaṃ etassāti nekkhammagaru.
tika-s0202t0:541_4: Tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārajjhāsayo nekkhammādhimutto svāyamattho yathā ekacce gahaṭṭhe labbhati,
tika-s0202t0:541_7: So hi vekhanasatāpasapabbajjaṃ upagantvā vekhanasena iminā diṭṭhimādāya samādiyitvā ṭhitattā “vekhanaso”ti vuccati.
tika-s0202t0:541_8: Yathā loko sayaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittopi samāno paccakkhato anubhaviyamānaṃ sālākikaṃ aggisantāpaṃ
tika-s0202t0:541_13: evaṃ ayampi anādikālaparibhāvitaṃ attaajjhāsaye avaṭṭhitaṃ kāmādhimuttaṃ sarasena anupadhārento satthārā –
tika-s0202t0:541_15: kāmaguṇā”tiādinā kāmaguṇesu kāmasukhe bhāsiyamāne “kāmādhimuttaṃ vata pabbajitassa citta”nti upadhāressatīti āha –
tika-s0202t0:541_19: te paṭicca uppajjanasukhato nibbānasukhameva aggabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ. Yathāha – “yāvatā,
tika-s0202t0:542_1: Pubbenivāsañāṇalābhino pubbantaṃ ārabbha vuccamānakathā anucchavikā tadatthassa paccakkhabhāvato,
tika-s0202t0:542_6: Ārakkhatthāyāti devatāhi mantapadehi saha ṭhitā tattha ārakkhatthāya.
tika-s0202t0:546_5: Tañhi tena saddhiṃ mayā idha katanti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0202t0:547_0: Idāni iminā pasaṅgena tāsaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “hasitañca nāmeta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:547_3: Nanu ca keci kodhavasenapi hasantīti? Na,
tika-s0202t0:547_5: tassa mayaṃ dāni yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjissāmāti duviññeyyantarena somanassacitteneva hāsassa uppajjanato.
tika-s0202t0:547_10: uppādesīti idaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:547_11: Na ahetukasomanassasahagatacittena bhagavato sitaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:548_0: Abhidhammaṭīkāyaṃ pana “atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ vatvā ‘imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa
tika-s0202t0:548_1: bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta’ntiādivacanato ‘bhagavato idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī’ti
tika-s0202t0:548_3: Tattha iminā hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsa-
tika-s0202t0:548_6: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷiaṭṭhakathānaṃ virodho.
tika-s0202t0:548_7: Tathā hi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:548_9: aññathā āvajjanassapi bhagavato pavatti tathārūpe kāle na saṃyujjeyya,
tika-s0202t0:548_13: na ca viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatte taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti tameva sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0202t0:548_16: Sā hi itaravijjulatā viya khaṇaṭṭhitikā sīghanirodhā ca na hoti,
tika-s0202t0:548_20: yadidaṃ tikkhattuṃ siravaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dāṭhaggesuyeva antaradhānaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:549_1: Yadipi cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca paññāpāramitā paribhāvitā,
tika-s0202t0:549_2: tathāpi idāni taṃ buddhantaraṃ tassā paṭipādetabbattā vuttaṃ “aparipakkañāṇattā”ti.
tika-s0202t0:549_4: evaṃ santepi nanu sammāsambuddhesu pasādena sambhāvanāya bhavitabbaṃ tathā cirakālaṃ paribhāvitattā,
tika-s0202t0:549_6: Cirakālaparicitāpi hi guṇabhāvanā appakenapi akalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena viparivattati aññathattaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0202t0:549_7: Tena mahāsattopi jātisiddhāyaṃ laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā jātisiddhena mānena evamāha –
tika-s0202t0:552_2: sā eva sināyanti kāyaṃ visodhenti etāyāti sinānaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0202t0:553_2: anāgāmīnaṃ nhānakāle attano kāyassa parihāraniyāmenāti attho.
tika-s0202t0:553_3: Attano ñāṇasampattiyā vibhavasampattiyā pasannakāraṃ kātuṃ sakkhissati.
tika-s0202t0:553_8: tesaṃ yāva ettha kesaggagahaṇaṃ tāva ayaṃ nibandho ahupīti attho.
tika-s0202t0:554_1: Satipaṭilābhatthāyāti bodhiyā mahābhinīhāraṃ katvā bodhisambhārapaṭipadāya pūraṇabhāve satiyā paṭilābhatthāya.
tika-s0202t0:554_2: Idāni tassa satuppādanīyakathāya pavattitākāraṃ saṅkhepeneva dassetuṃ “tassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:554_3: Tattha na lāmakaṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇasattoti iminā mahāsattassa paṇītādhimuttataṃ dassetvā evaṃ paṇītādhimuttikassa
tika-s0202t0:554_4: pamādakiriyā na yuttāti dassento “tādisassa nāma pamādavihāro na yutto”ti āha.
tika-s0202t0:554_5: Tadā bodhisattassa nekkhammajjhāsayo telappadīpo viya visesato nibbatti,
tika-s0202t0:554_6: taṃ disvā bhagavā tadanurūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ karonto “tādisassa…pe…
tika-s0202t0:554_10: yadidaṃ pūritapāramīnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ tathā dhammadesanā tesaṃ mahābhinīhārasamanantarampi bodhisambhārassa sayambhuñāṇeneva paṭividitattā.
tika-s0202t0:554_11: Tasmā bodhisattabhāvapavedanameva tassa bhagavā akāsīti dassetuṃ “satipaṭilābhatthāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0202t0:555_2: Tañhi paṭipattiyā upatthambhitaṃ ussitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0202t0:555_5: Tasmiṃ sammappadhānavasena pavatte bāhirapabbajjaṃ upagatāpi mahāsattā visuddhāsayā appicchatādiguṇasamaṅgino
tika-s0202t0:555_11: Maggaphalatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ na karonti paññāpāramitāya sabbaññutaññāṇagabbhassa aparipuṇṇattā aparipakkattā ca.
tika-s0202t0:556_5: Pubbe viya tato paraṃ tikhiṇena sūriyasantāpena payojanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ –
